mysql_reader¶

class mysql2pgsql.lib.mysql_reader.DB(options)¶

Class that wraps MySQLdb functions that auto reconnects thus (hopefully) preventing the frustrating “server has gone away” error. Also adds helpful helper functions.

close()¶
connect()¶
